top-page.title: Simple online rental applications
top-page.desc:
No more paper. No more hassle. When you accept time-stamped applications through Rentorr you see everything in one place, 
which makes it easy to track and compare potential new tenants.

img-desc.title: Bank-level security means your personal information is safe
img-desc.text: Any time you provide Rentorr with your sensitive information, we know you are putting a lot of trust in our system. We protect all of your information with a 128-bit encryption, the same that every bank uses. We have also partnered with Compuscan to make sure all of the credit information is accurate and secure.

title-one.title: What makes Rentorr's tenant screening the best?

item.title: Credit Check
item.text:
Rentorr gives you a detailed tenant credit report that includes all 
the important details- like 
a prospective tenant's credit score and payment history.

item.title: Verified Identity
item.text: Successful renting starts with trust. Know the true identity of your renter. Avoid tenants from hell.

item.title: Affordability Score
item.text: Use our clever math to determine long term affordability range of your renter. Rent to tenants who can afford the rent for your property and make on-time payments

item.title: Rental History
item.text: Keep track of all your completed payments, including deposits and special fees, for future reference.

rent.title: Ready to start using Rentorr
rent.desc: It shouldnâ€™t feel like a second job to live in a rental property. Rentorr was made to simplify the process and help you and your landlord have a better renting experience.

images.title:
Accept applications 
and screen tenants right from your listings
images.desc: Don't miss out on potential tenants: Allow people to apply right from your online rental listing. Applicants can apply as soon as they see your place, and you get a time-stamped digital application to help comply with Fair Housing laws.
